Quote.Author: Seamus Heaney
Quote.QuoteValue: I credit poetry for making this space-walk possible

Quote.Author: Seamus Heaney
Quote.QuoteValue: Write whatever you like!

Quote.Author: Seamus Heaney
Quote.QuoteValue: I always believed that whatever had to be written would somehow get itself written

Quote.Author: Sean Bean
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes all you need is a big leap of faith

Quote.Author: Sean Bean
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that you always have something left, that you take something of the character with you

Quote.Author: Sean Bean
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have a very good concept of your character, you can snap into it

Quote.Author: Sean Bean
Quote.QuoteValue: My family thought the fascination with acting was just another fad

Quote.Author: Sean Bean
Quote.QuoteValue: I love doing just nothing in my free time

Quote.Author: Sean Bean
Quote.QuoteValue: I like playing guys with swords and the horses and stuff like that

Quote.Author: Sean Bean
Quote.QuoteValue: George Martin looks like Santa Claus, but he's got a wonderfully disturbed mind

Quote.Author: Sean Bean
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're going to support a football team, do it 100 per cent

Quote.Author: Sean Bean
Quote.QuoteValue: I always like to do something different, something unusual, stray off the path a bit

Quote.Author: Sean Bean
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was younger, I used to watch all the black-and-white 'Dracula's and 'Frankenstein's

Quote.Author: Sean Combs
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't say that I've fully achieved my dream yet. I'm just starting to evolve

Quote.Author: Sean Combs
Quote.QuoteValue: It's okay to be crazy, but don't be insane

Quote.Author: Sean Combs
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't say it in a cocky way, but I take pride in being one of the best at doing what I do

Quote.Author: Sean Combs
Quote.QuoteValue: Bad Boy Entertainment did not shoot anybody. I didn't shoot anybody

Quote.Author: Sean Combs
Quote.QuoteValue: It feels like I could go outside with a bikini thong on right now

Quote.Author: Sean Combs
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to have a cultural impact. I want to be an inspiration, to show people what can be done

Quote.Author: Sean Combs
Quote.QuoteValue: If you dream and you believe, you can do it

Quote.Author: Sean Combs
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm glad the truth is out. I'm glad everyone knows I'm innocent, not guilty

Quote.Author: Sean Combs
Quote.QuoteValue: This whole Puff Daddy thing has taken a toll on me

Quote.Author: Sean Combs
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel safe in white because deep down inside, I'm an angel

Quote.Author: Sean Connery
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing like a challenge to bring out the best in man

Quote.Author: Sean Connery
Quote.QuoteValue: There's always a new challenge to keep you motivated

Quote.Author: Sean Connery
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always hated that damn James Bond. I'd like to kill him

Quote.Author: Sean Connery
Quote.QuoteValue: Love may not make the world go round, but I must admit that it makes the ride worthwhile

Quote.Author: Sean Connery
Quote.QuoteValue: I just think the most difficult thing to displace is privilege

Quote.Author: Sean Connery
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a kind of madness in cosmopolitan cities now

Quote.Author: Sean Connery
Quote.QuoteValue: To cultivate an English accent is already a departure away from what you are

Quote.Author: Sean Connery
Quote.QuoteValue: I like women. I don't understand them, but I like them

Quote.Author: Sean Connery
Quote.QuoteValue: There's one major difference between James Bond and me. He is able to sort out problems!

Quote.Author: Sean Connery
Quote.QuoteValue: More than anything else, I'd like to be an old man with a good face, like Hitchcock or Picasso

Quote.Author: Sean Hannity
Quote.QuoteValue: Can we pray for the re-election of George Bush?

Quote.Author: Sean Hannity
Quote.QuoteValue: Is it that you hate this president or that you hate America?

Quote.Author: Sean Hannity
Quote.QuoteValue: Why should one U.S. airman give up his life when our national security is not in imminent danger?

Quote.Author: Sean Hannity
Quote.QuoteValue: It doesn't say anywhere in the Constitution this idea of the separation of church and state

Quote.Author: Sean Hannity
Quote.QuoteValue: See what I have to put up with every night?

Quote.Author: Sean Hannity
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate when people use my tactics against me

Quote.Author: Sean Hannity
Quote.QuoteValue: My wife does wish I dressed better

Quote.Author: Sean Hannity
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm at peace with myself because what I talk about is the way I live

Quote.Author: Sean Hannity
Quote.QuoteValue: So the mayor of New Orleans would have used his own buses had the people had been white?

Quote.Author: Sean Hannity
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think we should proselytize a particular religion

Quote.Author: Sean Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: In school, I was a genius of the year preceding the year I was in, every year

Quote.Author: Sean Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: I can always see light in any situation. It's just the way I'm made

Quote.Author: Sean Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: That on a romantic level, if you feel it about somebody and it's pure, it means that they do too

Quote.Author: Sean Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: My favorite thing to do is not act - it's that simple

Quote.Author: Sean Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never really been one to get what they call stage fright so much

Quote.Author: Sean Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: Oh, I'm a big-mouth. I said a lot of things

Quote.Author: Sean Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: Yeah, I had actually tried to stop acting before I made Dead Man Walking

Quote.Author: Sean Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to believe that love is a reciprocal thing, that it can't really be felt, truly, by one

Quote.Author: Sean Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: I love acting, truly my favorite people are actors

Quote.Author: Sean Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: In between, I go broke because I seem to do movies where you're not paid a lot as an actor

Quote.Author: Sebastian Coe
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think I am a workaholic. I prefer to keep busy. It is better than the alternative

Quote.Author: Sebastian Coe
Quote.QuoteValue: All pressure is self-inflicted. It's what you make of it or how you let it rub off on you

Quote.Author: Sebastian Coe
Quote.QuoteValue: We need to be confident. We need not to blink

Quote.Author: Sebastian Coe
Quote.QuoteValue: I will go to my grave believing that participation is best driven by the well-stocked shop window

Quote.Author: Sebastian Coe
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to go back into politics - absolutely not

Quote.Author: Sebastian Coe
Quote.QuoteValue: World records are only borrowed

Quote.Author: Sebastian Coe
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody recognises that giving young people competitive outlet through sport is a very good thing

Quote.Author: Sebastian Coe
Quote.QuoteValue: Football was not what I was put on this planet to do

Quote.Author: Sebastian Coe
Quote.QuoteValue: I joined the local athletics club when I was 12, that's what I did. I did it of my own volition

Quote.Author: Sebastian Coe
Quote.QuoteValue: Marathons don't come to you overnight

Quote.Author: Sebastian Vettel
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes you need to press pause to let everything sink in

Quote.Author: Sebastian Vettel
Quote.QuoteValue: You're traveling all over the world but to be home is something special

Quote.Author: Sebastian Vettel
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't change what happened. But you can still change what will happen

Quote.Author: Sebastian Vettel
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't always say what you'd like to say

Quote.Author: Sebastian Vettel
Quote.QuoteValue: There are a few things that make me angry. Mostly things not going my way

Quote.Author: Sebastian Vettel
Quote.QuoteValue: Simply racing a Formula 1 car is an achievement

Quote.Author: Sebastian Vettel
Quote.QuoteValue: Teams like Ferrari, McLaren and Mercedes are going to be very, very motivated to go for the titles

Quote.Author: Sebastian Vettel
Quote.QuoteValue: If the boat started shaking, we stayed on course and didn't lose focus. That made the difference

Quote.Author: Sebastian Vettel
Quote.QuoteValue: The track in Abu Dhabi is special; this will be our third Grand Prix there

Quote.Author: Sebastian Vettel
Quote.QuoteValue: As a driver, your target is always to be with the most competitive team possible

Quote.Author: Selena Gomez
Quote.QuoteValue: You are who you surround yourself with. I know that's such a cliche quote, but it's true

Quote.Author: Selena Gomez
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in second chances, but I don't believe in third or fourth chances

Quote.Author: Selena Gomez
Quote.QuoteValue: My perfect guy wears converse, is totally laid back, and doesn't worry about being cool

Quote.Author: Selena Gomez
Quote.QuoteValue: I drive the same car that I've driven since I was 16. That's who I am

Quote.Author: Selena Gomez
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a kid, and a breakup is normal. I have to go through the emotions and feel it out

Quote.Author: Selena Gomez
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just happy to do projects I'm passionate about

Quote.Author: Selena Gomez
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not like I've wanted to go out and look for someone. I'm not really good at that

Quote.Author: Selena Gomez
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm young: I've lived my life in the public eye, and I've had to figure out how to do that

Quote.Author: Selena Gomez
Quote.QuoteValue: My fans are so important to me, and I would never want to disappoint them

Quote.Author: Selena Gomez
Quote.QuoteValue: I just try to be the best I can, but I'm human

Quote.Author: Serena Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really exciting. I smile a lot, I win a lot, and I'm really sexy

Quote.Author: Serena Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone's dream can come true if you just stick to it and work hard

Quote.Author: Serena Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: If anything, you know, I think losing makes me even more motivated

Quote.Author: Serena Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know if I've had my share of drama, but I've definitely had my share of hard times

Quote.Author: Serena Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Tennis just a game, family is forever

Quote.Author: Serena Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Tennis is my job, but it's not my life

Quote.Author: Serena Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been a fighter and I've always fought through things my whole life

Quote.Author: Serena Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not a robot. I have a heart and I bleed

Quote.Author: Serena Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be a giving woman and just a nice person in general

Quote.Author: Serena Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I decided I can't pay a person to rewind time, so I may as well get over it

Quote.Author: Seth Rogen
Quote.QuoteValue: As soon as I realized you could be funny as a job, that was the job I wanted

Quote.Author: Seth Rogen
Quote.QuoteValue: I love cold weather

Quote.Author: Seth Rogen
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't have to put dresses in a movie to make girls like it

Quote.Author: Seth Rogen
Quote.QuoteValue: My high school years were exactly like 'Superbad.'

Quote.Author: Seth Rogen
Quote.QuoteValue: After every single take, I laugh. It's my own awkwardness and discomfort about being an actor

Quote.Author: Seth Rogen
Quote.QuoteValue: Life, as I see it, is R-rated

Quote.Author: Seth Rogen
Quote.QuoteValue: My characters come from a good place

Quote.Author: Seth Rogen
Quote.QuoteValue: I am lazy, but for some reason, I am so paranoid that I end up working hard

Quote.Author: Seth Rogen
Quote.QuoteValue: I mean, where I come from, 'communism' is not a terrible word

Quote.Author: Seth Rogen
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in Vancouver, man. That's where more than half of my style comes from

Quote.Author: Shah Rukh Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: Success is not a good teacher, failure makes you humble

Quote.Author: Shah Rukh Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: I truly believe my job is to make sure people smile

Quote.Author: Shah Rukh Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no right time and right place for love... it can happen any time

Quote.Author: Shah Rukh Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: I think love can happen at any age... it has no age

Quote.Author: Shah Rukh Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: I am like a kid. I tell my family and friends I'm like a kid

Quote.Author: Shah Rukh Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: Even though I am fantastic looking, I am still quite intelligent

Quote.Author: Shah Rukh Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't kiss on screen. Period

Quote.Author: Shah Rukh Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: Success and failure are both part of life. Both are not permanent

Quote.Author: Shah Rukh Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: I talk to Allah, I pray to him

Quote.Author: Shah Rukh Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a personal me, there's an actor me and there's a star me

Quote.Author: Shakira
Quote.QuoteValue: In the full light of day, I don't want to think about the sunset

Quote.Author: Shakira
Quote.QuoteValue: If I can contribute to people having fun, I would feel very fulfilled as an artist

Quote.Author: Shakira
Quote.QuoteValue: A good fragrance should have a certain personality that makes people identify the scent with you

Quote.Author: Shakira
Quote.QuoteValue: Relationships have to have a give and take if they're going to work in the long term

Quote.Author: Shakira
Quote.QuoteValue: My brain, I believe, is the most beautiful part of my body

Quote.Author: Shakira
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm more afraid of marriage than death

Quote.Author: Shakira
Quote.QuoteValue: In this life, to earn your place you have to fight for it

Quote.Author: Shakira
Quote.QuoteValue: You're a song written by the hands of God

Quote.Author: Shakira
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm Colombian and nothing will change that

Quote.Author: Shakira
Quote.QuoteValue: Because of you, I'm running out of reasons to cry

Quote.Author: Shania Twain
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is a great natural high and a great natural escape

Quote.Author: Shania Twain
Quote.QuoteValue: Being betrayed is one of the most valuable lessons life can teach

Quote.Author: Shania Twain
Quote.QuoteValue: Writing is very much a playground - an artistic playground. It's the most fun thing I do

Quote.Author: Shania Twain
Quote.QuoteValue: I really hope my peers appreciate and respect what I'm doing

Quote.Author: Shania Twain
Quote.QuoteValue: It's important to give it all you have while you have the chance

Quote.Author: Shania Twain
Quote.QuoteValue: So many people bare their midriffs, I don't know why mine is such an issue

Quote.Author: Shania Twain
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like in a way I'm starting over, with everything

Quote.Author: Shania Twain
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll always be sad that my marriage ended

Quote.Author: Shania Twain
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't want to be outside during blackfly season

Quote.Author: Shania Twain
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoyed working at McDonald's

Quote.Author: Shaquille O'Neal
Quote.QuoteValue: I am the number one Ninja and I have killed all the Shoguns in front of me

Quote.Author: Shaquille O'Neal
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be strong, dominant. Like Wilt Chamberlain

Quote.Author: Shaquille O'Neal
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess people think the taller you are the more dominant you have to be

Quote.Author: Shaquille O'Neal
Quote.QuoteValue: Me shooting 40% at the foul line is just God's way to say nobody's perfect

Quote.Author: Shaquille O'Neal
Quote.QuoteValue: We want to win. We want to win big. We want to win the whole thing

Quote.Author: Shaquille O'Neal
Quote.QuoteValue: Someday I might have to put down a basketball and have a regular 9-to-5 like everybody else

Quote.Author: Shaquille O'Neal
Quote.QuoteValue: One lucky shot deserves another

Quote.Author: Shaquille O'Neal
Quote.QuoteValue: I started out as a football player. I liked to inflict pain. In basketball, it was the same thing

Quote.Author: Shaquille O'Neal
Quote.QuoteValue: I average 25 with three guys on me and they are just looking at stats I guess

Quote.Author: Shaquille O'Neal
Quote.QuoteValue: Being here feels like I'm out of prison. This is the right place, the right time, the right team

Quote.Author: Sharon Salzberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Voting is the expression of our commitment to ourselves, one another, this country and this world

Quote.Author: Sharon Salzberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Even on the spiritual path, we have things we'll tend to cover up or be in denial about

Quote.Author: Sharon Salzberg
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're wide open, the world is a good place

Quote.Author: Sharon Salzberg
Quote.QuoteValue: We need to redefine community and find a variety of ways of coming together and helping each other

Quote.Author: Sharon Salzberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Compassion isn't morose; it's something replenishing and opening; that's why it makes us happy

Quote.Author: Sharon Salzberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Voting is like alchemy - taking an abstract value and breathing life into it

Quote.Author: Sharon Salzberg
Quote.QuoteValue: What you learn about pain in formal meditation can help you relate to it in your daily life

Quote.Author: Sharon Salzberg
Quote.QuoteValue: My earliest experiences in meditation were in a context of intensive retreats

Quote.Author: Sharon Salzberg
Quote.QuoteValue: It is sometimes difficult to view compassion and loving kindness as the strengths they are

Quote.Author: Sharon Salzberg
Quote.QuoteValue: While you are meditating, if your mind wanders, gently bring it back to the present moment

Quote.Author: Shaun White
Quote.QuoteValue: Surfers have the most attitude

Quote.Author: Shaun White
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't stay away from Chinese food. I really love that stuff

Quote.Author: Shaun White
Quote.QuoteValue: I trip walking down the stairs, but I can skate them probably

Quote.Author: Shaun White
Quote.QuoteValue: Every time I've had a bad performance at an event, I've come back more determined and focused

Quote.Author: Shaun White
Quote.QuoteValue: I usually eat a pretty big steak the night before I compete

Quote.Author: Shaun White
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had dreams about tricks

Quote.Author: Shaun White
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not too big on moisturisers and fancy skin products. I keep my grooming regime nice and simple

Quote.Author: Shaun White
Quote.QuoteValue: Getting into music has changed my personality and way of doing things. I'm far more open now

Quote.Author: Shaun White
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm on the road a lot so when I get some time to relax I definitely take advantage

Quote.Author: Shaun White
Quote.QuoteValue: If you think I've got a lot of sponsors, you should see the stuff I turn down

Quote.Author: Shawn Mendes
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not the best singer in the world; I'm just good at picking up what I want to sound like

Quote.Author: Shawn Mendes
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing that scares me more than, like, being in the ocean by myself

Quote.Author: Shawn Mendes
Quote.QuoteValue: I carry around this little lion named Leo, which I've had for as long as I can remember

Quote.Author: Shawn Mendes
Quote.QuoteValue: People made fun of my skinny legs

Quote.Author: Shawn Mendes
Quote.QuoteValue: I like funny girls

Quote.Author: Shawn Mendes
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm all over the place with muffins. Carrots are great. Banana, chocolate chip, they rock, too

Quote.Author: Shawn Mendes
Quote.QuoteValue: Every time I write a song my approach changes

Quote.Author: Shawn Mendes
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a very spontaneous person. When I see something that might be fun or different, I will try it

Quote.Author: Shawn Mendes
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always upset about not doing things as good as I think I could have because I care

Quote.Author: Shawn Mendes
Quote.QuoteValue: I like dancers. I have a thing for girls who dance

Quote.Author: Shay Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel so good after a workout. Any time you can be alone with yourself is really important

Quote.Author: Shay Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a huge pasta and pizza lover. I can eat those every single day

Quote.Author: Shay Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: American Eagle clothing is stylish, flattering and all about embracing your individuality

Quote.Author: Shay Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: For my prom I really wanted to wear a bright color - something that was going to pop and stand out

Quote.Author: Shay Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm more comfortable in heels than I am in sneakers

Quote.Author: Shay Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: We all have to find beauty within us, as opposed to just our exterior

Quote.Author: Shay Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: I realized that bullying never has to do with you. It's the bully who's insecure

Quote.Author: Shay Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: It's kind of a shock to your skin, changing climates. It's new water, and new air quality

Quote.Author: Shay Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll never turn down a red velvet cupcake

Quote.Author: Shay Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate dieting. Let's just say that

Quote.Author: Shel Silverstein
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to find out what a writer or a cartoonist really feels, look at his work. That's enough

Quote.Author: Shel Silverstein
Quote.QuoteValue: What you've got to say, you say

Quote.Author: Shel Silverstein
Quote.QuoteValue: If the track is tough and the hill is rough, THINKING you can just ain't enough!

Quote.Author: Shel Silverstein
Quote.QuoteValue: You'd better get your laugh while you're making your point, or you won't be doing it very long

Quote.Author: Shel Silverstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Never explain what you do. It speaks for itself. You only muddle it by talking about it

Quote.Author: Shel Silverstein
Quote.QuoteValue: I myself do not believe in explaining anything

Quote.Author: Shel Silverstein
Quote.QuoteValue: People are always giving you credit for really wanting to say more than you said

Quote.Author: Shel Silverstein
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, freedom entitles you to do something, not to not do something

Quote.Author: Shel Silverstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Stand-up comics reflect less of a visual humor and more of a commentary

Quote.Author: Shel Silverstein
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a great myth about cartoonists, writers and people that are on TV

Quote.Author: Shepard Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: When I make an error, it's a very bad day in my house

Quote.Author: Shepard Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: There has to be news at a place called Fox News

Quote.Author: Shepard Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a journalist, I run to the fire, that's what we do

Quote.Author: Shepard Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: We are America; we don't torture. And the moment that is not the case, I want off the train

Quote.Author: Shepard Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I take the subway to work. I love mass transportation

Quote.Author: Shepard Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: We don't communicate in full sentences anyway. We don't need all those words

Quote.Author: Shepard Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: We have a product for sale called news, and I'm a salesman

Quote.Author: Shepard Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I like stories that affect families

Quote.Author: Shepard Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm fortunate enough not to be poor, and I'm not a bad tipper

Quote.Author: Shepard Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Oh, I don't talk about God

Quote.Author: Sheri L. Dew
Quote.QuoteValue: We are all farmers tending a little part of the Lord's vineyard

Quote.Author: Sheri L. Dew
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot have a relationship with someone you can't trust

Quote.Author: Sheri L. Dew
Quote.QuoteValue: I drove a tractor almost as soon as I could reach the pedals

Quote.Author: Sheri L. Dew
Quote.QuoteValue: No 11-year-old girl wants to be 5-10. I always felt big and unattractive

Quote.Author: Sheri L. Dew
Quote.QuoteValue: As sisters in Zion, we can be obstacles to the adversary's conspiracy against families and virtue

Quote.Author: Sheri L. Dew
Quote.QuoteValue: It is by letting the world go and coming unto Christ that we increasingly live as women of God

Quote.Author: Sheri L. Dew
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are in a position to influence someone, you are a leader

Quote.Author: Sheri L. Dew
Quote.QuoteValue: It is easier to motivate people to do something difficult than something easy

Quote.Author: Sheri L. Dew
Quote.QuoteValue: There isn't anyone who wants to see me married more than I do

Quote.Author: Sheri L. Dew
Quote.QuoteValue: My whole life, I've felt like I didn't quite measure up

Quote.Author: Sherman Alexie
Quote.QuoteValue: The dream he needed most was the dream that frightened him more

Quote.Author: Sherman Alexie
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, people speak in poetry all the time. They just don't realize it

Quote.Author: Sherman Alexie
Quote.QuoteValue: If I wasn't writing poems I'd be washing my hands all the time

Quote.Author: Sherman Alexie
Quote.QuoteValue: All I owe the world is my art

Quote.Author: Sherman Alexie
Quote.QuoteValue: My only purpose is to teach children to rebel against authority figures

Quote.Author: Sherman Alexie
Quote.QuoteValue: My father was always depressed. When he was home and sober, he was mostly in his room

Quote.Author: Sherman Alexie
Quote.QuoteValue: My name is Sherman J. Alexie Jr., and I am an insomniac

Quote.Author: Sherman Alexie
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in a storytelling culture, a tribal culture, but also in an American storytelling culture

Quote.Author: Sherman Alexie
Quote.QuoteValue: What inspires a poem for me is usually a moment

Quote.Author: Sherman Alexie
Quote.QuoteValue: Spiritual matters should be private

Quote.Author: Sheryl Sandberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Until women are as ambitious as men, they're not gong to achieve as much as men

Quote.Author: Sheryl Sandberg
Quote.QuoteValue: If more women are in leadership roles, we'll stop assuming they shouldn't be

Quote.Author: Sheryl Sandberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I have never worked for a woman, and I have never worked with a lot of women

Quote.Author: Sheryl Sandberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I would be better at my job if I were technical

Quote.Author: Sheryl Sandberg
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're more valuable, the people around you will do more to make it work

Quote.Author: Sheryl Sandberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I go around the room and ask people, 'What do you think?'

Quote.Author: Sheryl Sandberg
Quote.QuoteValue: The No. 1 impediment to women succeeding in the workforce is now in the home

Quote.Author: Sheryl Sandberg
Quote.QuoteValue: We've got to get women to sit at the table

Quote.Author: Sheryl Sandberg
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was in high school, I was voted most likely to succeed

Quote.Author: Sheryl Sandberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I want women to get paid more. I want to teach them to negotiate so they get paid more

Quote.Author: Shia LaBeouf
Quote.QuoteValue: I am trying to impress myself. I have yet to do it

Quote.Author: Shia LaBeouf
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a strikingly handsome guy, but I'm in movies

Quote.Author: Shia LaBeouf
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't tell you how many hot dogs I've eaten in my life

Quote.Author: Shia LaBeouf
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a hard time with free time

Quote.Author: Shia LaBeouf
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just selfish. I have to be for what I do

Quote.Author: Shia LaBeouf
Quote.QuoteValue: There's never been a parent in my life

Quote.Author: Shia LaBeouf
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have to live this lavish lifestyle

Quote.Author: Shia LaBeouf
Quote.QuoteValue: I've spent more on my Dodger tickets that I did on my car

Quote.Author: Shia LaBeouf
Quote.QuoteValue: Every actor chooses their story at the beginning

Quote.Author: Shia LaBeouf
Quote.QuoteValue: When golf used to be a rich man's sport, if you were poor you could not step foot on a course

Quote.Author: Shigeru Miyamoto
Quote.QuoteValue: The obvious objective of video games is to entertain people by surprising them with new experiences

Quote.Author: Shigeru Miyamoto
Quote.QuoteValue: Video games are bad for you? That's what they said about rock-n-roll

Quote.Author: Shigeru Miyamoto
Quote.QuoteValue: A delayed game is eventually good, but a rushed game is forever bad

Quote.Author: Shigeru Miyamoto
Quote.QuoteValue: Players are artists who create their own reality within the game

Quote.Author: Shigeru Miyamoto
Quote.QuoteValue: To create a new standard, you have to be up for that challenge and really enjoy it

Quote.Author: Shigeru Miyamoto
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to make something very unique, something very different

Quote.Author: Shigeru Miyamoto
Quote.QuoteValue: What comes next? Super Mario 128? Actually, that's what I want to do
